meaningMnemonic: A <radical>bamboo</radical> stalk looks the <radical>same</radical> as a big ol' <kanji>cylinder</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Picture a <kanji>cylinder</kanji> shaped <reading>とう</reading>きょう. All the buildings are cylinders. The city itself is cylinder shaped too. Even... gasp! The people of とうきょう!
